message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and features, I believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection. For this unique opportunity, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $15000.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of your product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $14000.
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to consider your proposal. In light of this, I am pleased to offer you our product at a price of $14500.
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $14000.
I appreciate your continued interest, Bob. To accommodate your budget while still ensuring you receive a product that meets our high standards, I am now offering it to you at $14200.
I appreciate your efforts to meet my budget, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $14000.
Considering your latest counteroffer, I am willing to negotiate further. I am now offering our premium product to you for $14100.
Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $14000.
I understand your position, Bob. In order to reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I am now offering our product at $14050.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to meet my budget. I would like to counteroffer at $14000.
